definition: older brother's wife/sister-in-law/(polite address to a younger married woman) sister

sentences.english: His voice pealed out from the next door.
sentences.chinese: 嫂嫂的聲音從隔壁的房裏傳過來。

sentences.english: In 1884, his beloved sister-in-law, Kadambari, committed suicide.
sentences.chinese: 1884年，深深愛他的嫂嫂卡丹芭莉自殺了。

sentences.english: She and her sister-in-law work in the same company.
sentences.chinese: 她和她嫂嫂在同一個公司工作。

sentences.english: It is true that the indulgence of his foster-mother encouraged him.
sentences.chinese: 不錯，我嫂嫂的溺愛也助長了他。

sentences.english: Not just your make-up. But also the way you enter your bath.
sentences.chinese: 豈知是卸妝，嫂嫂沐浴的順序我都知道。

sentences.english: My sister-in-law is your to-be wife's best friend.
sentences.chinese: 我的嫂嫂是你的未婚妻子最好的朋友。

definition: wife of mother's brother/aunt/maternal uncle's wife
wife of older male cousin via female line
wife of father's elder brother/aunt/(polite form of address for a woman who is about the age of one's mother)/CL:個|个[ge4]
wife of older male cousin via male line
adoptive mother (traditional adoption, i.e. without legal ramifications)
older brother's wife/sister-in-law/elder sister (respectful appellation for an older married woman)
